courses.title: Master In Scalping and Swing Trading
courses.description: Master the art of scalping and swing trading. Learn advanced strategies for intraday and positional trading with technical analysis and derivatives.

instructor.name: CA MOHIT GUPTA
instructor.bio: Expert in Scalping and Swing Trading with proven track record in intraday and positional strategies.

modules.title: Basics of Stock Market
topics: What is IPO? Steps in IPO
Bonus: Why & How the Bonus is issued, ratio calculation
Buyback, Merger, Demerger, FPO, OFS & Right Issue
Terms like: Inflation, Interest Rates, Major Economic Terms

modules.title: Technical Analysis
topics: Two Candle Patterns: Engulfing & Harami Patterns, Piercing Pattern & Dark Cloud Cover
Three Candle Patterns: Falling & Rising Three, Morning Star & Evening Star
Moving Averages: EMA & SMA, Calculations & Representation
Chart Patterns & Their Study (Price Channels: Bullish, Bearish, Cup & Handle, Rounding Top & Rounding Bottom)
Stochastics: Calculation, Use in Practical Trading (Intraday & Swing)

modules.title: Derivatives Market (Futures & Options)
topics: Introduction to Derivatives: Difference b/w Futures & Forwards, Basic Future Terminologies, Participants in Derivative Market
Pricing of Futures: How to calculate Future Price?, Zone of Convergence, Physical Settlement
Hedging: Hedging of Stocks with Futures, Concept of BETA, Hedging Using Index (Nifty & Bank Nifty)
Options Introduction: What is Option Trading?, Comparison b/w Cash Market, Future Market & Option Market, Call Option, Moneyness of Option, Pricing of Options, Example & Payoff Calculation
Introduction to Put Option: Moneyness of Option, Pricing of Options, Example & Payoff Calculation
Introduction to Greeks: What are Greeks?, Use of Greeks, Options Buying Strategies (Call), Options Buying Strategies (Put)
Option Buying Strategies (Live example on Stocks & Index, Bull Call Spreads & Bear Call Spreads (ITM, OTM & ATM), Straddles & Strangles
Long Strategies: Call Ratio Backspread, Put Ratio, Back Spread, Long Butterfly Spread, Iron Condors, Iron Flies, Payoffs & Live Examples
Spreads: Bull Call Spread (Revision), Converting it to Ratio Spreads, Bear Put Spread (Revision), Converting it to Ratio Spreads, Collar Spreads, Ratio Spreads, Standard & Reverse Jade Lizard
Straddles & Strangles, Iron Fly & Iron Condors, Covered Calls & Cash Protected Puts, Advanced Selling Strategies, Revision & Practical Implications
Open Interest (Advanced), Option Chain Analysis (Advanced), PCR Ratio & Max Pain

All about Volatility: Explanation of IV, IVP, Normal Distribution & Stock Returns, Volatility Index, VIX Trading & Adjustments, Volatility Smile & Volatility Skew, Range Calculation using Historical Volatility

modules.title: Commodity Market
topics: Introduction to Commodities Market: Diversification, Hedging, Speculation, Commodities Exchanges
Commodity Derivatives Explained: Futures Contracts in Commodities, Options in Commodities
Fundamental Analysis in Commodities: Demand-Supply Drivers, Macroeconomics Triggers
Risk Management in Commodities: Volatility in Commodities, Position Sizing, Leverage Management
Option Trading in Commodities: Commodity Options, Option Chain Analysis
Technical Analysis for Commodities: Charts & Patterns, Key Indicators, Multi-timeframe Commodity Analysis

modules.title: No Code Algo
topics: Option Selling Strategies: Straddle, Strangle Builders, Multi-leg Deployment
Indicator-based Option Strategies: Combine Indicators, Options, Premium Threshold Entry, VIX Filtered Strategies
Advanced Logic - ORB, Trending Day Filters, Capital Allocation Models
Calendar-Based & Multi-Asset Algos: Day-Based Strategies, Index + Stock Combos, Multi Asset Deployment
Algo Monitoring & Automation: Live Deployment Tips, Broker/API Integrations
Basics of No-Code Platforms: Overview of Tools, Workflow & Backtest Settings
Building No Code Intraday Strategies: Stoploss, Targets, Win Rate, Max Drawdown, Expectancy
Positional Strategy Automation: Multi-Day Strategies, Gap Up/Down Handling, Delivery vs MIS logic
Algo Portfolio Management: Diversification in Algos & Capital Split Planning

courses.title: Investment & Fundamental Analysis
courses.description: Learn fundamental analysis for long-term investing and wealth creation. Master business analysis, financial statements, and valuation methods.

instructor.name: CA MANISH SINGH
instructor.bio: Expert in Fundamental Analysis and Investment Strategies with extensive experience in financial markets.
